name: Let's Get Lit Chanukah Bundle
description:
Hello, Happy Chanukah and welcome to the Let's Get Lit Chanukah  Bundle Page!

This bundle includes:

* A remake of the classic Chanukah tradition; a 3d cosmic dreidel game
* A functional, interactive Menorah with Hebrew and English blessings
* A custom emoji pack with over 10 holiday-themed emojis for use all year round
* Some neat little extras on the history/customs of Chanukah for those who would like to learn or share! 

All the instructions/controls are included in the download, explaining how to unpack and use each. This project is a labour of love I wish to share with my communities as well as those less familiar with Jewish history and customs, so I hope even those who don't celebrate Chanukah will learn something new and enjoy it regardless! 

Thank you for stopping by and warm holiday wishes to everyone! <3 くコ:彡
